item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, February 13, 2025 at 3:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump says US and Russia to start talks on Ukraine war ‘immediately’
2. Saudi Arabia launches ferocious state media attack on Netanyahu
3. US inflation unexpectedly increases to 3% in January
4. Return to pre-2014 Ukraine borders ‘unrealistic’, says US defence secretary
5. [Opinion] Tariffs won’t bring back America’s unipolar moment
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, February 13, 2025 at 3:20 AM UTC
